庒字的基本解释

庒
zhuāng
古同“庄”：“我有庒事儿央你。”

庒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuāng］
［《廣韻》側羊切，平陽，莊。］
亦作“庒1”。“庄1”的繁体字。
(1)严肃；庄重。
(2)严正。
(3)恭敬。
(4)装饰。
(5)四通八达的道路。
(6)村庄；郊野的住宅、别墅。
(7)封建时代皇室、贵族、地主、寺院等占有并经营的大片土地。
(8)旧称大商号或专门经营某地区货物的商号。
(9)庄家。
(10)量词。后作“樁”。
(11)姓。战国时有庄周、庄蹻。

Basic explanation of words
庒
zhuāng
Gu Tong "Zhuang": "I have something to ask you."
庒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuāng］
["Guangyun" side sheep cut, Pingyang, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "庒1". Traditional characters for "庄1".
(1) Serious; solemn.
(2) Stern.
(3) Respectfully.
(4) Decoration.
(5) Roads extending in all directions.
(6) Villages; houses and villas in the countryside.
(7) Large tracts of land occupied and operated by royal families, nobles, landlords, and temples in the feudal era.
(8) Formerly known as a major firm or a firm that specializes in goods in a certain area.
(9) Banker.
(10) Quantifiers. Later as a "pile".
(11) Last name. During the Warring States Period, there were Zhuang Zhou and Zhuang Zhu.
